objects.name: ArcaneDoor
objects.description: [ArcaneDoor](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0046) is a campaign targeting networking devices from Cisco and other vendors between July 2023 and April 2024, primarily focused on government and critical infrastructure networks. [ArcaneDoor](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0046) is associated with the deployment of the custom backdoors [Line Runner](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1188) and [Line Dancer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1186). [ArcaneDoor](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0046) is attributed to a group referred to as UAT4356 or STORM-1849, and is assessed to be a state-sponsored campaign.(Citation: Cisco ArcaneDoor 2024)(Citation: CCCS ArcaneDoor 2024)

external_references.description: Canadian Centre for Cyber Security. (2024, April 24). Cyber Activity Impacting CISCO ASA VPNs. Retrieved January 6, 2025.
Cisco Talos. (2024, April 24). ArcaneDoor - New espionage-focused campaign found targeting perimeter network devices. Retrieved January 6, 2025.
